segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman is standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice, and it’s spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and the boy is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes like nothing is happening, and it’s amazing she hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting deeper, and the floor must be so slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall before the woman even turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting more and more, and it’s shocking that no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone realizes what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just incredible—how can no one see what’s going on?
segments.speaker: PAR
